text: The 2012 International GTSprint Series season was the third year of the International GTSprint Series. The season began at Monza on 1 April and finished at Pergusa on 28 October. Andrea Palma won the championship, driving a Ferrari. ==Teams and drivers== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 85%;" ! Team ! Car ! No. ! Drivers ! Class !
